slides.title: You are in a good hands
slides.text1: Sexence was made by professionals in human sexuality, technology geeks, and really cool guys.
slides.text2: Our app offers is a lifestyle and wellness platform that helps you enhance your sexual pleasure to create a better lifestyle.

slides.text1: Use the daily Sexence button to get your insights and value every day. Then we will offer personalized  content, wellness products and programs.
First, just a few quick questions so we can create a personalized experience just for you.
